location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3164 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter (folios 103-04) relating to his tour of the Gulf and his efforts to mediate in the conflict between Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr of Ra’s al-Khaymah and the tribes of Ḩamrīyah. Anderson writes that the Governor in Council approves of Jones’s proceedings and awaits further reports on the subject.
